GV05agsas_2u:5: tatropapattyāpi dvaitasya vaitathyaṃ śakyate 'vadhārayitum iti dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam ārabhyate
GV05agsas_2u:7: antaḥsthānāt tu bhāvānāṃ saṃvṛtatvena hetunā // MandUpK_2.1 //
GV05agsas_2u:9: kasya? sarveṣāṃ bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ bhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ svapna upalabhyamānānām, āhuḥ kathayanti, manīṣiṇaḥ pramāṇakuśalāḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:10: vaitathye hetumāhāntaḥsthānāt, antaḥ śarīrasya madhye sthānaṃ yeṣām /
GV05agsas_2u:11: tatra hi bhāvopalabhyante parvatahastyādayo na bahiḥ śarīrāt /
GV05agsas_2u:13: nanvapavarakādyantarupalabhyamānair ghaṭādibhiranaikāntiko hetur ityāśaṅkyāha saṃvṛtatvena hetuna iti /
GV05agsas_2u:15: na hy antaḥ saṃvṛte dehento nāḍīṣu parvatahastyādīnāṃ saṃbhavo 'sti, na hi dehe parvataḥ, asti //1//
GV05agsas_2u:17_0: svapnadṛśyānāṃ bhāvānāmantaḥ saṃvṛtasthānamityetad asiddham, yasmāt prācyeṣu supta udakṣu svapnān paśyann iva dṛśyata ityetad
GV05agsas_2u:17_1: āśaṅkyāha adīrghatvāc ca kālasya gatvā deśān na paśyati pratibuddhaś ca vai sarvas tasmin deśe na vidyate // MandUpK_2.2 //
GV05agsas_2u:19: yasmāt suptamātra eva dehadeśād yojanaśatāntarite māsamātraprāpye deśe svapnān paśyann iva dṛśyate /
GV05agsas_2u:20: na ca tad deśaprāpter āgamanasya dīrghaḥ kālo 'sti /
GV05agsas_2u:21: ato dārghatvāc ca kālasya na svapnadṛgdeśāntaraṃ gacchati /
GV05agsas_2u:22: kiṃ ca pratibuddhaś ca vai sarvaḥ svapnadṛksvapnadarśanadeśe na vidyate /
GV05agsas_2u:23: yadi ca svapne deśāntaraṃ gacched yasmin deśe svapnān paśyet tatraiva pratibudhyeta /
GV05agsas_2u:25: rātrau supto 'hanīva bhāvān paśyati, bahubhiḥ saṃgato bhavati, yaś ca saṃgataḥ tair gṛhyeta
GV05agsas_2u:26: na ca gṛhyate, gṛhītaścetvām adya tatropalabdhavanto vayam iti vayamiti
GV05agsas_2u:28: na caitad asti tasmān na deśāntaraṃ gacchati svapne //2//
GV05agsas_2u:30: itaś ca svapnadṛśyā bhāvā vitathā yataḥ abhāvaś ca rathādīnāṃ śrūyate nyāyapūrvakam /
GV05agsas_2u:31: vaitathyaṃ tena vai prāptaṃ svapna āhuḥ prakāśitam // MandUpK_2.3 //
GV05agsas_2u:32: abhāvaś caiva rathādīnāṃ svapnadṛśyānāṃ śrūyate nyāyapūrvakaṃ yuktitaḥ
GV05agsas_2u:35: dehāntaḥ sthānasaṃvṛtatvādihetunā prāptaṃ vaikathyaṃ tad anuvādinyā śrutyā svapne svayañjyotiṣṭvapratipādanaparayā prakāśitamāhur brahmavidaḥ //3//
GV05agsas_2u:37: antasthānāt tu bhedānāṃ tasmāj jāgarite smṛtam /
GV05agsas_2u:38: yathā tatra tathā svapne saṃvṛtatvena bhidyate // MandUpK_2.4 //
GV05agsas_2u:39: jāgrad dṛśyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vaitathyam iti pratijñā /
GV05agsas_2u:40: dṛśyatvād iti hetuḥ svapnadṛśyabhāvavad iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:41: yathā tatra svapne dṛśyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vaitathyaṃ tathā jāgarite 'pi
GV05agsas_2u:43: tasmāj jāgarite 'pi vaitathyaṃ smṛtam iti nigamanam /
GV05agsas_2u:44: antaḥsthānāt saṃvṛtatvena ca svapnadṛśyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ jāgrad dṛśyebhyaḥ bhedaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:48: bhedānāṃ hi samatvena prasiddhenaiva hetunā // MandUpK_2.5 //
GV05agsas_2u:49: prasiddhenaiva bhedānāṃ grāhyagrāhakatvena hetunā samatvena svapnajāgaritasthānayor ekatvamāhurvivekina iti pūrvapramāṇasiddhasyaiva phalam //5//
GV05agsas_2u:51: itaś ca vaitathyaṃ jāgrad dṛśyānāṃ bhedānām ādyantayor abhāvāt /
GV05agsas_2u:52: ādāvante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā /
GV05agsas_2u:53: vitathaiḥ sadṛśāḥ santo 'vitathā iva lakṣitāḥ // MandUpK_2.6 //
GV05agsas_2u:54: yadādāv ante ca nāsti vastu mṛgatṛṣṇikādi tanmadhye 'pi nāsty ati niścitaṃ
GV05agsas_2u:56: ādyantayor abhāvād vitathair eva mṛgatṛṣṇikādibhiḥ sadṛśatvād vitathā eva tathāpi vitathā iva lakṣitā mūḍhair anātmavidbhiḥ //6//
GV05agsas_2u:58: svapnadṛśyavajjāgaritadṛśyānām api satvam iti yad uktaṃ tad ayuktam /
GV05agsas_2u:59: yasmāj jāgrad dṛśyā annapānavāhanādayaḥ kṣutpipāsādinivṛttiṃ kurvanto gamanāgamanādikāryaṃ ca saprayojānā dṛṣṭāḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:61: tasmāt svapnadṛśyavad jāgrad dṛśyānām asatvaṃ manorathamātram iti /
GV05agsas_2u:63: kasmāt? yasmāt saprayojanatā teṣāṃ svapne vipratipadyate /
GV05agsas_2u:64: tasmād ādyantavatvena mithyaiva khalu te smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_2.7 //
GV05agsas_2u:65: saprayojanatā dṛṣṭā yā annapānādīnāṃ sā svapne vipratipadyate /
GV05agsas_2u:66: jāgarite hi bhuktvā pītvā ca tṛpto vinivartitatṛṭsuptamātra eva kṣutpipāsādyārtam ahorātroṣitaṃ bhuktavantam ātmānaṃ manyate /
GV05agsas_2u:67: yathā spapne bhuktvā pītvā ca tṛpta utthitas tathā /
GV05agsas_2u:68: tasmād jāgrad dṛśyānāṃ svapne vipratipattir dṛṣṭā /
GV05agsas_2u:69: ato manyāmahe teṣām apy asatvaṃ spapnadṛśyavadanāśaṅkanīyam iti /
GV05agsas_2u:70: tasmād ādyantavatvamubhayatra samānam iti mithyā iva khalu te smṛtāḥ //7//
GV05agsas_2u:72: svapnajāgradbhedayoḥ samatvāj jāgradbhedānām asatvam iti yad uktaṃ tadasat /
GV05agsas_2u:76: na hi jāgrad dṛṣṭā evaite bhedāḥ svapne dṛśyante /
GV05agsas_2u:79: anyad apy evaṃprakāram apūrvaṃ paśyati svapne /
GV05agsas_2u:80: tan nānyenā asatā samam iti sadeva /
GV05agsas_2u:83: tan na, svapne dṛṣṭam apūrvaṃ yan manyase na tatsvataḥ siddham /
GV05agsas_2u:86: tānayaṃ prekṣate gatvā yathaiveha suśikṣitaḥ // MandUpK_2.8 //
GV05agsas_2u:87: apūrvaṃ sthānidharmo hi sthānino draṣṭur eva hi svapnasthānavato dharmaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:92: yathaiveha loke suśikṣito deśāntaramārgastane mārgeṇa deśāntaraṃ gatvā tānpadārthānpaśyati tadvat /
GV05agsas_2u:93: tasmādyathā sthānidharmāṇāṃ rajjusarpamṛgatṛṣṇikādīnāmasatvaṃ tathā svapnadṛṣyānāmapūrvāṇāṃ sthānidharmatvamevetyasattvamato na svapnadṛṣṭāntasyāsiddhatvam //8//
GV05agsas_2u:95: apūrvatvāśaṅkā nirākṛtā svapnadṛṣṭāntasya punaḥ svapnatulyatāṃ jāgradbhedānāṃ prapañcayannāha
GV05agsas_2u:96: svapnavṛttāv api tv antaś cetasā kalpitaṃ tv asat /
GV05agsas_2u:97: bahiś cetogṛhītaṃ sad dṛṣṭaṃ vaitathyam etayoḥ // MandUpK_2.9 //
GV05agsas_2u:98: svapnavṛttāv api svapnasthāne 'py antaś cetasā manorathasaṅkalpitam asat /
GV05agsas_2u:99: saṅkalpānantarasamakālam evādarśanāt tatraiva svapne bahiś cetasā gṛhītaṃ cakṣurādidvāreṇopalabdhaṃ ghaṭādi sat /
GV05agsas_2u:100: ity eva satyam iti niścite 'pi sadasadvibhāgo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:103: jāgradvṛttāvapi tv antaś cetasā kalpitaṃ tv asat /
GV05agsas_2u:104: bahiścetogṛhītaṃ sad yuktaṃ vaitathyam etayoḥ // MandUpK_2.10 //
GV05agsas_2u:107: codaka āha ubhayor api vaitathyaṃ bhedānāṃ sthānayor yadi /
GV05agsas_2u:108: ka etān budhyate bhedān ko vai teṣāṃ vikalpakaḥ // MandUpK_2.11 //
GV05agsas_2u:111: smṛtijñānayoḥ ka ālambanamityabhiprāyaḥ, na cennirātmavāda iṣṭaḥ //11//
GV05agsas_2u:114: sa eva budhyate bhedān iti vedāntaniścayaḥ // MandUpK_2.12 //
GV05agsas_2u:115: svayaṃ svamāyayā svamātmānamātsā deva ātmanyeva vakṣyamāṇaṃ bhedākāraṃ kalpayati rajjvādāviva sarpādīn svayameva ta tānbudhyate bhedāṃstadvadevetyevaṃ vedāntaniścayaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:116: nānyo 'sti jñānasmṛtyāśrayo na ca nirāspada eva jñānasmṛtī
GV05agsas_2u:119: saṅkalpayankena prakāreṇa kalpayatītyucyate vikaroty aparān bhāvān antaścitte vyavasthitān
GV05agsas_2u:120: niyatāṃś ca bahiścitta evaṃ kalpayate prabhuḥ // MandUpK_2.13 //
GV05agsas_2u:121_0: vikaroti nānā karotyaparāṃl laukikān bhāvān padārthāñ śabdādīnanyāṃścāntaścitte vāsanārūpeṇa vyavasthitānavyākṛtān niyatāṃśca
GV05agsas_2u:121_1: pṛthvyādīnaniyatāṃśca kalpanākālānbahiścittaḥ saṃstathāntaścitto manorathādilakṣaṇānityevaṃ kalpayati prabhurīśvara ātmetyarthaḥ //13 //
GV05agsas_2u:126: cittakālā hi ye 'ntas tu dvayakālāś ca ye bahiḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:127: kalpitā eva te sarve viśeṣo nānyahetukaḥ // MandUpK_2.14 //
GV05agsas_2u:128: cittakālā hi ye 'ntastu cittaparicchedyāḥ, nānyaścittakālavyatirekeṇa paricchedakaḥ kālo yeṣāṃ te cittakālāḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:131: yathāgodohanamāste, yāvadāste tāvadgāṃ dogdhi yāvadgāṃ dogdhi tāvadāste /
GV05agsas_2u:132: tāvānayametāvānsa iti parasparaparicchedyaparicchedakatvaṃ bāhyānāṃ bhedānāṃ te dvayakalā antaścittakālā bāhyāśca dvayakālāḥ kalpitā eva te sarve /
GV05agsas_2u:136: avyaktā eva ye 'ntas tu sphuṭā eva ca ye bahiḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:137: kalpitā eva te sarve viśeṣas tv indriyāntare // MandUpK_2.15 //
GV05agsas_2u:138: yadapyantaravyaktatvaṃ bhāvānāṃ manovāsanāmātrābhivyaktānāṃ sphuṭatvaṃ vā bahiścakṣurādīndriyāntare viśeṣo nāsau bhedānāmastitvakṛtaḥ svapne 'pi
GV05agsas_2u:141: ataḥ kalpitā eva jāgtadbhāvā api svapnabhāvavaditi siddham //15//
GV05agsas_2u:143: bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ bhāvānāmitaretaranimittanaimittikatayā kalpanāyāṃ kiṃ mūlamityucyate jīvaṃ kalpayate pūrvaṃ vaco bhāvān pṛthagvidhān /
GV05agsas_2u:144: bāhyān ādhyātmikāṃś caiva yathāvidyas tathāsmṛtiḥ // MandUpK_2.16 //
GV05agsas_2u:145: jīvaṃ hetuphalātmakam, ahaṃ karomi mama sukhaduḥkhe ityevaṃ lakṣaṇam,
GV05agsas_2u:146: anevaṃlakṣaṇa eva śuddha ātmani rajjāviva sarpaṃ kalpayate pūrvam /
GV05agsas_2u:149: yo 'sausvayaṅkalpito jīvaḥ sarvakalpanāyāmadhikṛtaḥ sa yathāvidyaḥ, yādṛśī vidyā vijñānamasyeti yathāvidyaḥ, tathāvidhaiva smṛtistasyeti tathāsmṛtirbhavati sa iti /
GV05agsas_2u:150_0: ato hetukalpanāvijñānātphalavijñānaṃ tato hetiphalasmṛtistatastadvijñānaṃ tadarthakriyākārakatatphalabhedavijñānāni tebhyastatsmṛtistatsmṛteśca
GV05agsas_2u:152: tatra jīvakalpanā sarvakalpanāmūlamityuktaṃ saiva jīvakalpanā kiṃnimitteti dṛṣṭāntena pratipādayati aniścitā yathā rajjur andhakāre vikalpitā /
GV05agsas_2u:153: sarpadhārādibhir bhāvais tadvad ātmā vikalpitaḥ // MandUpK_2.17 //
GV05agsas_2u:154_0: yathā loke svena rūpeṇāniścitānavadhāritaivameveti rajjurmandāndhakāre kiṃ sarpa udakadhārā daṇḍa iti vānekadhā vikalpitā
GV05agsas_2u:154_1: bhavati pūrvaṃ svarūpāniścayanimittaṃ yadi hi pūrvameva rajjuḥ svarūpeṇa niścitā syāt, na sarpādivikalpo 'bhaviṣyad yathā
GV05agsas_2u:157: rajjur eveti cādvaitaṃ tadvad ātmaviniścayaḥ // MandUpK_2.18 //
GV05agsas_2u:158: rajjureveti niścaye sarvavikalpanivṛttau rajjureveti cādvaitaṃ yathā tathā
GV05agsas_2u:163: yadyātmaika eveti niścayaḥ kathaṃ prāṇādibhiranantairbhāvairetaiḥ saṃsāralakṣaṇairvikalpita ity ucyate, śṛṇu prāṇādibhir anantaiś ca bhāvair etair vikalpitaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:164: māyaiṣā tasya devasya yayā saṃmohitaḥ svayam // MandUpK_2.19 //
GV05agsas_2u:166: yathā māyāvinā vihitā māyā gaganamativimalaṃ kusumitaiḥ sapalāśaistarubhirākīrṇamiva karoti tatheyamapi devasya māyā yayāyaṃ svayamapi mohita iva mohito bhavati /
GV05agsas_2u:169: prāṇa iti prāṇavido bhūtānīti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:170: guṇā iti guṇavidas tattvānīti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.20 //
GV05agsas_2u:171: pādā iti pādavido viṣayā iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:172: lokā iti lokavido devā iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.21 //
GV05agsas_2u:173: vedā iti vedavido yajñā iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:174: bhokteti ca bhoktṛvido bhojyam iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2. 22 //
GV05agsas_2u:175: sūkṣma iti sūkṣmavidaḥ sthūla iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:176: mūrta iti mūrtavido 'mūrta iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.23 //
GV05agsas_2u:177: kāla iti kālavido diśa iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:178: vādā iti vādavido bhuvanānīti tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.24 //
GV05agsas_2u:179: mana iti manovido buddhir iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:180: cittam iti cittavido dharmādharmau ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.25 //
GV05agsas_2u:181: pañcaviṃśaka ity eke ṣaḍviśa iti cāpare /
GV05agsas_2u:182: ekatriṃśaka ity āhur ananta iti cāpare // MandUpK_2.26 //
GV05agsas_2u:183: lokāṃl lokavidaḥ prāhur āśramā iti tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:185: sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭivido laya iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:186: sthitir iti sthitividaḥ sarve ceha tu sarvadā // MandUpK_2.28 //
GV05agsas_2u:187: prāṇaḥ prājño bījātmā tatkāryabhedā hītare sthatyantāḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:188: anye ca sarve laukikāḥ sarvaprāṇiparikalpitā bhedā rajjvāmiva sarpādayas tacchūnya ātmanyātmasvarūpāniścayahetoravidyayā kalpitā iti
GV05agsas_2u:190: prāṇādiślokānāṃ pratyekaṃ padārthavyākhyāne phalguprayojanatvātsiddhapadārthatvācca yatno na kṛtaḥ //28//
GV05agsas_2u:192: kiṃ bahunā yaṃ bhāvaṃ darśayed yasya taṃ bhāvaṃ sa tu paśyati /
GV05agsas_2u:193: taṃ cāvati sa bhūtvāsau tadgrahaḥ samupaiti tam // MandUpK_2.29 //
GV05agsas_2u:194: prāṇādīnāmanyatamamuktamanuktaṃ vānyaṃ bhāvaṃ padārthaṃ darśayedyasyācāryo 'nyo vāpta idameva tattvamiti sa taṃ bhāvamātmabhūtaṃ paśyatyayamahamiti vā mameti vā /
GV05agsas_2u:195: taṃ ca draṣṭāraṃ sa bhāvo 'vati yo darśito bhāvo 'sau bhūtvā rakṣati /
GV05agsas_2u:202: evaṃ yo veda tattvena kalpayet so 'viśaṅkitaḥ // MandUpK_2.30 //
GV05agsas_2u:203: etaiḥ prāṇādibhirātmano 'pṛthagbhūtairapṛthagbhāvaireṣa ātmā rajjuriva sarpādi vikalapnārūpaiḥ pṛthageveti lakṣito 'bhilakṣito niścito mūḍhairityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:204: vivekināṃ tu rajjvāmiva kalpitāḥ sarpādayo nātmavyatirekeṇa prāṇādayaḥ santītyabhiprāya idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā (bṛ.u.2.4.6, 4.5.7) iti śruteḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:205_0: evamātmavyatirekeṇāsatvaṃ rajjusarpavadātmani kalpitānāmātmānaṃ ca kevalaṃ nirvikalpaṃ yo veda tattvena śrutito yuktitaśca
GV05agsas_2u:205_1: sa aviśaṅkito vedārthaṃ vibhāgataḥ kalpayetkalpayatītyarthaḥ idamevaṃparaṃ vākyamado 'nyaparamiti
GV05agsas_2u:211: yadetdvaitasyāsattvamuktaṃ yuktitastadetadvedāntapramāṇāvagatamityāha svapnamāye yathā dṛṣṭaṃ gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
GV05agsas_2u:212: tathā viśvam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vedānteṣu vicakṣaṇaiḥ // MandUpK_2.31 //
GV05agsas_2u:213: svapnaśca māyā ca svapnamāye 'sadvastvātmike 'satyau sadvastvātmika iva lakṣyete 'vivekibhiḥ
GV05agsas_2u:214_0: yathā ca prasāritapaṇyā paṇagṛhaprāsādastrīpuñjanapadavyavahārākīrṇamiva gandharvanagaraṃ dṛśyamānameva sadakasmādabhāvatāṃ
GV05agsas_2u:214_1: gataṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā ca svapnamāye dṛṣṭe 'sadrūpe, tathā viśvamidaṃ dvaitaṃ samastamasaddṛṣṭam /
GV05agsas_2u:232: yadā vitathaṃ dvaitamātmaivaikaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃstadedaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati sarvo 'yaṃ laukiko vaidikaśca vyavahāro 'vidyāviṣaya eveti /
GV05agsas_2u:233: tadā na nirodho na cotpattir na baddho na ca sādhakaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:234: na mumukṣur na vai mukta ity eṣā paramārthatā // MandUpK_2.32 //
GV05agsas_2u:235: na nirodhaḥ nirodhanaṃ nirodhaḥ pralayaḥ, utpattirjananam, baddhaḥ saṃsārī jīvaḥ, sādhako mādhanavānmokṣasya, mumukṣurmocanārthī, mukto vimuktabandhaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:244: sato hyutpattiḥ pralayo vā syānnāsataḥ śaśaviṣāṇāde /
GV05agsas_2u:247: yastu punardvaitasaṃvyavahāraḥ sa rajjusarpavadātmani prāṇādilakṣaṇaḥ kalpita ityuktam /
GV05agsas_2u:248: na hi manovikalpanāyā rajjusarpādilakṣaṇāyā rajjvāṃ pralaya utpattirvā /
GV05agsas_2u:249: na ca manasi rajjusarpasyotpattiḥ pralayo vā na cobhayato vā /
GV05agsas_2u:251: na hi niyate manasi suṣupte vā dvaitaṃ gṛhyate /
GV05agsas_2u:257: na; rajjusarpādivikalpanāyā nirāspadatvānupapattiriti pratyuktametatkathamujjīvayasītyāha rajjurapi sarpavikalpasyāspada bhūtā vikalpitaiveti dṛṣṭāntānupapattiḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:265: katham? sukhyahaṃ duḥkhī mūḍho jāto mṛto jīrṇo dehavān paśyāmi vyakto
GV05agsas_2u:266: 'vyaktaḥ kartā phalī saṃyukto viyuktaḥ kṣīṇo vṛddhohaṃ mamaita ityevamādayaḥ sarva ātmanyadhyāropyante
GV05agsas_2u:269: yadā caivaṃ viśeṣyasvarūpapratyayasya siddhatvānna kartavyatvaṃ śāstreṇa /
GV05agsas_2u:272: svarūpeṇānavasthānaṃ svarūpāvasthānaṃ ca śreya iti sukhitvādinivartakaṃ śāstram ātmanyasukhitvādipratyayakaraṇena neti netyasthūlādivākyaiḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:280: pūrvaślokārthasya hetumāha bhāvair asadbhir evāyam advayena ca kalpitaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:281: bhāvā apy advayenaiva tasmād advayatā śivā // MandUpK_2.33 //
GV05agsas_2u:282: yathā rajjvāmasadbhiḥ sapradhārādibhiradvayena ca rajjudravyeṇa satāyaṃ sarpa iyaṃ dhārā daṇḍo 'yamiti vā rajjudravyameva kalpyata evaṃ
GV05agsas_2u:284_0: hyapracalite manasi kaścidbhāva upalakṣayituṃ śakyate kenacit; na cātmanaḥ pracalanamasti; pracalitasyaivopalabhyamānā bhāvā
GV05agsas_2u:284_1: na paramārthataḥ santaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyāḥ ato 'sadbhireva prāṇādabhāvairadvayena ca paramārthasatātmanā rajjuvattarvavikalpāspadabhūtenāyaṃ
GV05agsas_2u:286: te ca prāṇādibhāvāṃ apyadvayenaiva satātmanā vikalpitāḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:287: na hi nirāspadā kācitkalpanopalabhyate; ataḥ sarvakalpanāspadatvātsvenātnādvayasyāvyabhicārātkalpanāvasthāyāmapyadvayatā śivā /
GV05agsas_2u:295: na pṛthaṅ nāpṛthak kiñcid iti tattvavido viduḥ // MandUpK_2.34 //
GV05agsas_2u:296: na hyatrādvaye paramārthasatyātmani prāṇādisaṃsārajātamidaṃ jagadātmabhāvena paramārthasvarūpeṇa nirīpyamāṇaṃ nānā vastvantarabhūtaṃ bhavati /
GV05agsas_2u:297: yathā rajjusvarūpeṇa prakāśena nirūpyamāṇo na nānābhūtaḥ kalpitaḥ sarpo 'sti tadvat /
GV05agsas_2u:300: tathānyonyaṃ na pṛthakprāṇādi vastu yathāśvānmahiṣaḥ pṛthagvidyata evam /
GV05agsas_2u:301: ato 'stvānnāpṛthagvidyate 'nyonyaṃ pareṇa vā kiñcidity evaṃ paramārthatattvamātavido brāhmaṇā viduḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:305: nirvikalpo hy ayaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ prapañcopaśamo 'dvayaḥ // MandUpK_2.35 //
GV05agsas_2u:306_1: rvikalpaḥ sarvavikalpaḥ śūnyo 'mātmā dṛṣṭa upalabdho vedāntārthatatparaiḥ
GV05agsas_2u:307_0: prapañcopaśamaḥ prapañco dvaitabhedavistārastasyopaśamo 'bhāvo yasminsa ātmā prapañcopaśamo 'ta evādvayo vigatadoṣaireva
GV05agsas_2u:310: yasmātsarvānarthapraśamarūpatvādadvayaṃ śivamabhayam tasmād evaṃ viditvainam advaite yojayet smṛtim /
GV05agsas_2u:314: taccādvaitamavagamyāhamasmi paraṃ brahmeti viditvāśanāyādyatītaṃ sākṣādaparokṣādajamātmānaṃ sarvalokavyavahārātītaṃ jaḍavallokamācaret /
GV05agsas_2u:317: kayā caryayā lokamācaredityāha niḥstutir nirnamaskāro niḥsvadhākāra eva ca /
GV05agsas_2u:318: calācalaniketaś ca yatir yādṛcchiko bhavet // MandUpK_2.37 //
GV05agsas_2u:322_1: yadā tadā calo deho niketo yasya sa ayamevaṃ calācalaniketo vidvānna
GV05agsas_2u:325: tattvam ādhyātmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā tattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu bāhyataḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:326: tattvībhūtas tadārāmas tattvād apracyuto bhavet // MandUpK_2.38 //
GV05agsas_2u:327: bāhyaṃ pṛthivyāditatvaṃ ādhyātmikaṃ ca dehādilakṣaṇaṃ rajjusarpādivatsvapnamāyādivacca asat”vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyam”
GV05agsas_2u:330: ātmā ca sabāhyābhyantaro hyajo 'pūrvo 'nantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsna ākāśavatsarvagataḥ sūkṣmo 'calo nirguṇo niṣkalo niṣkriyaḥ”tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi”(chā.u.6 /
GV05agsas_2u:332_0: ityevaṃ tattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tattvībhūtastadārāmo na bāhyaramaṇo yathātattvadarśī kaściccittamātmatvena pratipannaścittacalanamanucalitamātmānaṃ
GV05agsas_2u:333: samāhite cu manasi kadācittattvabhūtaṃ prasannātmānaṃ manyata idānīmasmi tattvībhūta iti; na tadātmavidbhavet /
GV05agsas_2u:336: bhavedityabhiprāyaḥ”śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ”(gītā 12 /
